dlmanager.name: Download Manager
dlmanager.description: Upload .torrent or .nzb files to queue downloads.
dlmanager.install_files: dlmanager.xml, package.xml, __init__.py, QueueController.py, NZB/__init__.py, NZB/Decoder.py, NZB/Extractor.py, NZB/nntplib2.py, NZB/NZBClient.py, NZB/NZBParser.py, libtorrent/__init__.py, libtorrent/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1, libtorrent/libboost_filesystem.so.1.46.1, libtorrent/libtorrent.pyd, libtorrent/libboost_python-py27.so.1.46.1, libtorrent/libtorrent-rasterbar.so.6, libtorrent/libboost_system.so.1.46.1, libtorrent/libtorrent.so, html/jman.html, html/jmanlite.html, js/common.js, js/jman.js, js/jmanlite.js, css/style.css, images/nzb.png, images/torrent.png, images/unrar.png, images/par2.png
